title: Operando X-ray absorption spectroscopy of Fe–N–C catalysts based on carbon black and biomass-derived support materials for the ORR
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00342J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Garlef Wartner, Julia Müller-Hülstede, Hanna Trzesniowski, Michael Wark, Peter Wagner, Robert Seidel
Novel biomass based Fe–N–C catalysts exhibit a higher density of FeNx type sites with different redox characteristics compared to carbon black based Fe–N–Cs. These different characteristics are influenced by heteroatom doping and undercoordination.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
